refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a full dependency entry for the required version of an extension

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description; #include <zend_modules.h>
voidZEND_MOD_REQUIRED_EX char *name char *rel char *ver
ZEND_MOD_REQUIRED_EX generates a zend_module_dep entry for the extension named by ext_name, including version information. It allows to specify requirements like "up to version x.y", "starting with version x.y" or "exactly version x.y".
Version specific comparisons are not implemented yet, so for now ZEND_MOD_REUQUIRE and ZEND_MOD_REQUIRE_EX define identical behavior.

&reftitle.parameters;
name
Name of the required extension
rel
Comparison operator, one of eq, lt, le, gt, or ge
ver
Version string

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Code to register the required extension
